column4: and look for the adapter, if you don't see it you may need to install drivers

Quick question regarding alsa sound and Gnome, sound wasn't working properly so I did /etc/init.d/aslasound restart usually a window pops up and tells me to reload something, I don't remember what it says explicitly; however this time I didn;t hit reload and now I have no sound icons on my gnome panel or any sound from my speakers, although the drivers are working.
maybe something to do with reloading the sound card module?
ill look at the modules I got and see if any of them are sound related.
